events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our development team.
The recruitment team has reviewed your application and categorized it under the engineering department for further evaluation.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your case and will be contacting you shortly to discuss the next steps.
Your initial screening interview was completed successfully with positive feedback on your technical knowledge and problem-solving skills.
The candidate has replied promptly, expressing enthusiasm for the role and confirming availability for the upcoming technical interview.
We have scheduled your technical interview with our lead developer for May 7th at 10 AM, looking forward to assessing your coding abilities.
